change.changenote: Section 3 (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 76/2022, effective March 30, 2022.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: is an employee, acting in the course of his or her employment, of a person who holds an aquatic plant culture licence.

change.changenote: Section 8 (1) (b) and (c) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 76/2022, effective March 30, 2022.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: is an employee, acting in the course of his or her employment, of a person who holds a wild aquatic plant harvester licence,
is exempt under subsection (3) or is an employee, acting in the course of his or her employment, of a person who is exempt under subsection (3), or

change.changenote: Part 9, sections 67 and 68 BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 261/2016, effective January 1, 2019.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 66 (1) and (3) of the Act, a person who holds a licence issued under the Fish Inspection Act or the Fisheries Act, as those Acts read immediately before their repeal, to do an activity described in

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: section 3 [aquatic plant culture licence] of this regulation is deemed to hold an aquatic plant culture licence for the purpose of doing that activity,
section 8 [wild aquatic plant harvester licence] of this regulation is deemed to hold a wild aquatic plant harvester licence for the purpose of doing that activity,
section 16 [fisher vendor licence] of this regulation is deemed to hold a fisher vendor licence for the purpose of doing that activity,
section 21 [fish receiver licence] of this regulation is deemed to hold a fish receiver licence for the purpose of doing that activity, or
section 27 [seafood processor licence] of this regulation is deemed to hold a seafood processor licence for the purpose of doing that activity.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A licence that a person is deemed to hold under this section expires on the earliest date as follows:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: in the case of a fisher vendor licence, a fish receiver licence or a seafood processor licence, on December 31, 2017;
in any case, on the date

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: of expiry as set out on the licence issued under the Fish Inspection Act or the Fisheries Act, as applicable, or
set by a licensing officer on giving notice to the person who holds the licence.

change.changenote: Section 16 (1) (c) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 76/2022, effective March 30, 2022.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: is an employee, acting in the course of his or her employment, of a person referred to in paragraph (a) or (b).

change.changenote: Section 21 (1) (c) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 76/2022, effective March 30, 2022.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: is an employee, acting in the course of his or her employment, of a person referred to in paragraph (a) or (b).

change.changenote: Section 27 (c) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 76/2022, effective March 30, 2022.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: is an employee, acting in the course of his or her employment, of a person referred to in paragraph (a) or (b).
